messages.message: Getting this error when trying to extract tables. Happening in UAT & prod
@Lalit is that the thing you’ve merged a fix for?

Looks like so, since this is working with advanced model.
It seems there is some regression from OpenAI.
Hey @Will McDermott would you mind opening a ticket for this on the EPD board in Jira please?

@Lalit curious to know what is the error? let's make sure our first step is always make sure we return something instead of "unable to send message / error during model run". As in, if Open AI result changes, the worst case we do is that the chat return "No tables are found in this document", instead of an exception / model error. cc @Hari

We can always improve table extraction accuracy, but returning an error like this will be treated as a bug :confused:
Error was happening when the model did not return the response in JSON as instructed. Agree that we need to handle this better.

@Lalit
Is there a mitigation for default model that we can handle here ?

`gpt-3.5-turbo-0301` is reportedly having some regression. Not sure if there's a mitigation for default model, but we need to handle such errors better.
https://community.openai.com/t/gpt-3-5-turbo-0301-showing-different-behavior-suddenly/431326
